content: this legal text discusses a case between two parties referred to as og and jg in the republic of estonia the court has ruled that og is partially successful in their suit for the partition of community property og will have sole ownership of a property a sailing vessel and a vehicle they will also receive half of the securities in a securities account og is ordered to pay jg compensation for the surplus joint assets additionally jg is obligated to grant a declaration of intent to og regarding ogs ownership of a part of real estate the court has determined that og must pay jg a certain amount but the specific amount is not mentioned the court has also ordered the payment of procedural costs by each party
